long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your Productivity to the HeroMode! 

HeroMode is a complete Work & Life Organizer. You can organize tasks, manage projects, build habits, and see your progress towards your goals, all in one place!

By integrating learnings from Behavioral Science, HeroMode is a task organizer that motivates you.  So you can get more done with less agony, effort, and willpower.

* Cognitive Reframing - HeroMode organizes your projects, habits, and goals as "Adventures", and tasks, chores, to-do's as "Quests".  Complete Quests to progress in your Adventure!  

* Customizable Organization - Decorate your Adventures with colors and images!  Customized Adventures that speak to your purpose can keep you motivated! 

* Immediate Rewards - Complete Quests, and get Points!  Immediate rewards keep you going as you make progress along your Adventure.

* Build Habits - Use Repeat Quests to kick start the habit loop.  

* Prioritize and Stay Focused - Lock away non-urgent Quests. Chain up Quests by dependency.

* Visualize Progress - HeroMode comes with many ways to see how far you have come. You can see your Activity Calendars, analyze points, and create custom Milestones.

* Buddies - Collaborate on projects, share household chores, or have friendly fitness competitions!

* Document Everything - You can record notes or images for each Quest with Mementos.

* Cross Platform - HeroMode is also available as a mobile app! Your Quests and Adventures are automatically synchronized across devices.  So you can keep on knocking out those Quests even when you are on the go!

Website: https://heromode.app/
Blog with HeroMode updates and productivity tips: https://heromode.app/blog
